duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support across various areas of the employee lifecycle, such as benefits & compensation administration, compliance processes, HRIS and data, and onboarding & offboarding.
Assist with inquiries regarding benefits elections, changes, or plan information.
Aid in job descriptions, evaluation, market survey, and classification projects.
Assist with HR information systems data entry, review, or reporting.
Aid in policy and procedure dissemination, collection, filing, updates, or inquiries.
Assist with the analysis, audit, collection, preparation, or review of compliance or regulatory reporting data.
Support with new hire notices, processing, or orientation.
Aid in termination processing or notices.

education_certification.credential: Currently enrolled in a degree program, preferable in business, HR, or related.
At least junior status (or having completed over 50% of required degree credits).
